# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Automatically generated by the script oomph_generate_cmake_script

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16..3.20 FATAL_ERROR)
project(fish_poisson C CXX Fortran)
find_package(oomphlib REQUIRED)
include(CTest)

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME fish_poisson
  SOURCES fish_poisson.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::poisson MPI::MPI_CXX
  CXX_STANDARD 14)

# ---------------------------------- TESTING ----------------------------------

oomph_add_test(
  TEST_NAME mpi.fish_poisson
  TARGET_DEPENDENCIES fish_poisson
  EXTRA_REQUIRES
    fish_fully_automatic_partition.dat fish_incremental_partition.dat
    fish_selective_partition.dat distributed_adapt.mcr
  LABELS "mpi;fish_poisson"
  REQUIRES_MPI_RUN_COMMAND)

# Indicate that this test requires the resource REQUIRES_SOLE_USE_OF_CPU_MPI.
# We'll pass this to all other MPI-enabled self-tests to ensure that parallel
# self-test do NOT run at the same time!
set_tests_properties(mpi.fish_poisson PROPERTIES RESOURCE_LOCK
                                                 REQUIRES_SOLE_USE_OF_CPU_MPI)

# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
